hero.title: The AI-Powered Productivity Operating System
hero.subtitle: Transform team performance with the world's first self-learning project intelligence platform that anticipates roadblocks, automates workflows, and delivers real-time strategic insights—before you even know you need them.
hero.timelinePreview: Smart timeline with automated dependency mapping

features.title: Why Teams Choose IntelliFlow Over Basic Task Managers
features.subtitle: Experience the difference with our AI-powered platform designed for modern teams

ai.title: AI Co-Pilot
ai.desc: Not just automation—your projects get an autonomous strategist

details.1: Predicts deadline risks 72 hours earlier than manual tracking
details.2: Auto-assigns tasks based on real-time skills mapping
details.3: Generates boardroom-ready reports with one natural language command
details.4: Provides continuous optimization suggestions as work progresses

ai.enhancedSubtitle: Comprehensive AI functionalities to transform your project management experience

projectTaskGuidance.desc: Our AI generates detailed implementation guides and intelligently breaks down complex tasks

guides.title: Implementation Guides
guides.desc: AI generates detailed, step-by-step implementation guides for tasks based on historical data, best practices, and individual user skills. These guides break down complex tasks into manageable subtasks and include resource recommendations and estimated completion times.

decomposition.title: Task Decomposition
decomposition.desc: The system intelligently suggests how to divide large tasks into smaller, actionable components, ensuring a smoother workflow and better progress tracking.

timeResource.desc: AI-powered time estimates and resource allocation recommendations to optimize project planning

estimates.title: Accurate Time Estimates
estimates.desc: Using historical time entry data, the AI calculates optimistic, realistic, and pessimistic time estimates for tasks. It factors in the team members' skills to adjust estimates dynamically.

allocation.title: Resource Allocation Recommendations
allocation.desc: The system recommends optimal resource distribution (e.g., budget allocation, manpower) based on project complexity and past performance, ensuring balanced workloads and efficient operations.

teamFormation.desc: Intelligent team composition and workload balancing for optimal project performance

skillMatching.title: Skill Matching
skillMatching.desc: AI evaluates team members' profiles and historical performance to recommend ideal team compositions. It matches required skills for tasks with available expertise, ensuring the best fit for each project.

workloadBalancing.title: Workload Balancing
workloadBalancing.desc: The system monitors individual workloads and suggests adjustments to prevent burnout and maintain efficiency across the team.

predictiveAnalytics.desc: Forecast project progress and identify potential risks before they impact your project

forecasting.title: Progress Forecasting
forecasting.desc: The AI predicts project progress by analyzing trends and historical data, offering early warnings about potential delays or budget overruns.

riskIdentification.title: Risk Identification
riskIdentification.desc: Advanced algorithms assess project risks such as security vulnerabilities, schedule delays, and financial discrepancies, providing actionable recommendations to mitigate these risks.

reporting.desc: Generate comprehensive reports and concise content summaries automatically

generation.title: Dynamic Report Generation
generation.desc: The system automatically generates detailed reports, including progress summaries, financial overviews, and team performance metrics. Reports are customizable by role and can be delivered in various formats.

summarization.title: Content Summarization
summarization.desc: For lengthy documents or reports, AI generates concise summaries, highlights key metrics, and checks for plagiarism to ensure originality and consistency.

fileManagement.desc: Intelligent file handling with compression, integrity verification, and content summarization

compression.title: File Compression and Integrity
compression.desc: The system supports dynamic file compression and converts files to secure hash values to prevent tampering. Users can easily zip files or folders for efficient space management.

summary.title: Document Summarization
summary.desc: AI automatically extracts and summarizes the content of long documents, making it easier for users to get an overview without reading the entire file.

chatAssistant.desc: Interact with an intelligent assistant that understands your project context and needs

interface.title: Chatbot Interface
interface.desc: Users interact with an AI-powered chatbot that can answer queries about projects, tasks, and system status. The chatbot uses natural language processing to understand context and provide relevant information.

contextAware.title: Context-Aware Responses
contextAware.desc: The assistant tailors its responses based on user roles and current project context, ensuring that the advice and recommendations are highly relevant.

integration.desc: Seamlessly connect with popular tools and access a marketplace of themes and extensions

options.title: Flexible Integration Options
options.desc: The system supports seamless integration with popular third-party tools like Slack, Jira, Trello, and VSCode. This allows developers and teams to customize their workflows and access data across platforms.

marketplace.title: Marketplace for Themes and Extensions
marketplace.desc: A built-in marketplace offers a variety of UI themes and additional feature modules. Users can purchase and apply themes dynamically, just like mobile devices change skins.

roles.desc: Create custom roles with specific permissions for different organizational needs

creation.title: Dynamic Role Creation
creation.desc: Administrators can create custom roles with specific permissions to cater to different organizational structures. This flexibility allows single users, small teams, or large enterprises to tailor the system to their unique requirements.

access.title: Granular Access Control
access.desc: Different levels of access ensure that sensitive features are only available to authorized users, while regular team members get a simplified interface.

attendance.desc: Automated attendance monitoring and intelligent work hour allocation

system.title: Automated Attendance System
system.desc: The platform includes a flexible attendance system with customizable intervals. This system allows managers to monitor active hours and adjust work schedules dynamically.

allocation.title: Dynamic Work Hour Allotment
allocation.desc: AI analyzes work patterns and allocates optimal work hours for each team member, ensuring that projects progress steadily and employees are not overburdened.

analytics.desc: Monitor key performance metrics and predict potential system issues

dashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
dashboard.desc: The system offers a centralized dashboard that visualizes key performance metrics such as system uptime, resource utilization, budget utilization, and more.

maintenance.title: Predictive Maintenance
maintenance.desc: By analyzing system metrics, AI can predict potential hardware or software issues and recommend proactive measures to prevent downtime.

versionControl.desc: Integrated version tracking and customizable workflow processes

integrated.title: Integrated Version Control
integrated.desc: The platform supports version control on a per-team and per-user basis, enabling effective collaboration and tracking of changes over time.

workflow.title: Customizable Workflow Options
workflow.desc: Users can define their workflow processes, set deadlines, and manage task dependencies. The system provides notifications and reminders to keep projects on track.

workflows.title: Custom Workflows
workflows.desc: Create tailored workflows for different project types and teams

details.3: Custom approval processes and validation rules

military.title: Military-Grade Security
military.desc: Enterprise-level security with advanced encryption and compliance

details.2: Role-based access controls and audit logs
details.3: Compliance with GDPR, HIPAA, and ISO standards

integrations.title: Seamless Integrations
integrations.desc: Connect with your favorite tools and platforms for a unified workflow

details.1: Over 100+ pre-built integrations with popular tools
details.2: Custom API access for specialized connections
details.3: Bi-directional data sync with external systems

results.title: Battle-Tested Results
results.faster: 227% faster project kickoffs with AI-generated templates
results.saved: 41 hours/month saved per team member on status updates
results.earlyWarning: Early warning system catches 83% of risks before they escalate

roi.enhancedSubtitle: Measurable outcomes that our AI-powered platform delivers

enhancedProductivity.desc: increase in team productivity with AI task guidance

costSavings.desc: reduction in project costs through AI resource optimization

riskReduction.desc: of potential project risks identified before they impact timeline

timeToMarket.desc: faster time-to-market with AI workflow automation

stats.hoursSaved: Hours Saved Per Team Member Weekly

perfectFor.title: Perfect For
perfectFor.scaleups: Scaleups where processes break at 50+ employees
perfectFor.distributed: Distributed teams drowning in async chaos

difference.title: The IntelliFlow Difference
difference.quote: Other tools show you where your projects are—we show you where they're going, why it matters, and exactly how to optimize the path forward.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your team's needs

roiCalculator.title: ROI Calculator
roiCalculator.subtitle: See how much you can save

jira.description: Integrate with Jira issues and projects

usecases.title: Use Cases
usecases.executivesCase: Need real-time visibility into project progress, resource allocation, and financial performance.
usecases.executivesResult: Get comprehensive dashboards with KPIs, budget tracking, and resource utilization metrics.
usecases.engineersCase: Need to collaborate on technical tasks, track issues, and manage code integration.
usecases.engineersResult: Access streamlined ticketing system with Git integration and automated workflows.
usecases.pmsCase: Need to plan projects, allocate resources, track progress, and report on milestones.
usecases.pmsResult: Use interactive Gantt charts, resource allocation tools, and automated reporting.
